title: Python Powered Restful API Basics with Web2py
description: Web2py's rapid prototyping capabilities can be leveraged to bootstrap quickly through initial prototypes into full production environments. RESTful API construction can be a powerful developer tool to modularizing applications for maintenance and optimization. Basics of RESTful API design and implementation will be covered with a case study tutorial. Concepts will be expanded upon to leverage built in web2py functionality for rapid prototyping.
